document.docAuthor: Marshall, Stephen A., Roháček, Jindřich, Dong, Hui & Buck, Matthias
document.masterDocTitle: The state of Sphaeroceridae (Diptera: Acalyptratae): a world catalog update covering the years 2000 - 2010, with new generic synonymy, new combinations, and new distributions

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: The state of Sphaeroceridae (Diptera: Acalyptratae): a world catalog update covering the years 2000 - 2010, with new generic synonymy, new combinations, and new distributions

subSubSection.paragraph:
Phthitia ( K. ) bicornis
Su & Liu, 2009
. Distr.: Palaearctic: China (NIN).

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Phthitia bicornis Su & Liu, 2009c: 476
[male only]. Type locality: China , Ningxia Prov. HT male (SACS).

subSubSection.paragraph:
Phthitia ( K. ) ciliata
(Duda, 1918)
. Distr.: Palaearctic: Algeria , Cyprus , Israel , Italy ( Sicily ), Tunisia .

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Phthitia ( Kimosina ) ciliata
. –
ROHÁČEK (2007a) : 116
[deleted record from Madeira ].

Phthitia ciliata
. –
ROHÁČEK (2010b) : 239
[deleted record from Azores ].

subSubSection.paragraph:
Phthitia ( K. ) emarginata
Marshall, 2009
. Distr.: Australasian / Oceanian: New Zealand .

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Phthitia emarginata
Marshall, 2009
in
MARSHALL et al.(2009) :50
. Type locality: New Zealand ,Banks Peninsula. HT male (NZAC).

subSubSection.paragraph:
Phthitia ( K. ) glabrescens
(Villeneuve, 1917)
. Distr.: Palaearctic: Greece , Italy (incl. Sicily ), Romania , Serbia .

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Phthitia ( Kimosina ) glabrescens
. –
SU & LIU (2009c) : 475
[misrecorded from China (NIN), see below under
P. pteremoides
].

subSubSection.paragraph:
Phthitia ( K. ) longisetosa
(Dahl, 1909)
. Distr.: Palaearctic: Austria , Belgium , Bulgaria , Czech Republic , Denmark , Estonia , Finland , France , Germany , Great Britain , Hungary , Iran , Ireland , Italy , Latvia , Lithuania , Macedonia, Montenegro , Netherlands , Norway , Poland , Russia (WS), Slovakia , Spain , Sweden , Turkey .

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Phthitia ( Kimosina ) longisetosa
. –
NASH (1989) : 152
[new record from Ireland ].

Phthitia longisetosa
. –
GATT (2007) : 302
[new record from Turkey ].

subSubSection.paragraph:
Phthitia ( K. ) plesiocercus
Marshall, 2009
. Distr.: Australasian / Oceanian: New Zealand .

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Phthitia plesiocercus
Marshall, 2009
in
MARSHALL et al. (2009) : 49
. Type locality: New Zealand , Lake Taupo. HT male (NZAC).

subSubSection.paragraph:
Phthitia ( K. ) plumosula
(Rondani, 1880)
. Distr.: Afrotropical:? Ethiopia ; Nearctic: Canada (NB, NS, ON), USA (CT, MD, PA, VA, WI); Neotropical: Chile ,? Ecuador ; Palaearctic: Andorra , Austria , Azores ( Portugal ), Belgium , Bosnia and Herzegovina , Bulgaria , China (HEB), Canary Is. ( Spain ), Cyprus , Czech Republic , Denmark , Estonia , Finland , France (incl. Corsica ), Germany , Great Britain , Greece , Hungary , Iceland , Ireland , Italy (incl. Sardinia ), Latvia , Macedonia, Madeira ( Portugal ), Montenegro , Netherlands , Norway , Poland , Romania , Russia (CET, FE), Slovakia , Spain (incl. Balearic Is.), Sweden , Switzerland , Tunisia , Turkey ; South Atlantic: Gough I.

Phthitia ( K. ) pteremoides
(Papp, 1973)
. Distr.: Palaearctic: Afghanistan , China (MON, NIN), Iran , Mongolia , Spain , Tadjikistan , United Arab Emirates .

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Phthitia ( Kimosina ) pteremoides
. –
GATT (2008) : 700
[new record from United Arab Emirates ].

Phthitia ( Kimosina ) glabrescens
. –
SU & LIU (2009c) : 475
[misidentification, new record from China (NIN)].

subSubSection.paragraph:
Phthitia ( K. ) sicana
(Munari, 1988)
. Distr.: Palaearctic: Cyprus , Italy ( Sicily ), Malta , Morocco , Tunisia .

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Phthitia ( Kimosina ) sicana
. –
ROHÁČEK (2004b) : 254
[new record from Cyprus ];
GATT (2007) : 303
[new records from Morocco , Tunisia ].
